title: Worldwide shipments of smart watches 2013 to 2015
summary: The chart at hand is a line chart where the x axis denotes Year and a y axis denotes Shipments in millions. In total the number of data points it has is 3.
In general Shipments in millions has rose over the Year.
Shipments in millions is slightly increasing from 2013 to 2015.
The most drastic increase took place within the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Shipments in millions, about 24.92 was reported at Year 2015
Minimum Shipments in millions about 1.23 was reached at Year 2013
min_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Shipments in millions, containing a total of 3 data points.

max_summary: This is a line chart with an x axis representing Year and a y axis representing Shipments in millions, containing a total of 3 data points.
In general Shipments in millions has rose over the Year.
Shipments in millions is slightly increasing from 2013 to 2015.
The steepest increase occurs in between the Year 2014 and 2015.
Maximum Shipments in millions, about 24.92 was reported at Year 2015
Minimum Shipments in millions about 1.23 was reached at Year 2013
The line drastically increased by 6.0 times from Year 2013 to 2014, and lastly, increased by 3.3 times from Year 2014 to 2015.
